name: Update AssemblyInfo
description: Update your AssemblyInfo files during build
author: Sebastian Lux

inputs.name: rootFolder
inputs.label: Root folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder to update AssemblyInfo files. Use variables like $(Build.SourcesDirectory).

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: File pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File pattern to determine which files are updated. You can use wildcard like *AssembyInfo.cs.

inputs.name: assemblyProduct
inputs.label: Product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyProduct attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyDescription attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept. This can be used to add product specific information to the description e.g. additional version information.

inputs.name: assemblyCopyright
inputs.label: Copyright
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyCopyright attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyCompany
inputs.label: Company
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyCompany attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyTrademark
inputs.label: Trademark
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyTrademark attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyConfiguration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyConfiguration attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyVersion attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyFileVersion
inputs.label: File version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyFileVersion attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: assemblyInformationalVersion
inputs.label: Informational version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the AssemblyInformationalVersion attribute with this value. If left empty, original value will be kept.

inputs.name: customAttributes
inputs.label: Custom attributes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update custom attributes using the pattern 'AssemblyAttribute=value', each key-value pair separated by a semicolon (e.g. 'FirstNameAssemblyAttribute=John;LastNameAssemblyAttribute=Doe').
